author: treyzania
content: yeah the faster finality is a pretty big deal

author: treyzania
content: you also don't have to rely on any economic arguments by default to ensure it will work

author: sky.cactus
content: It is extremely easy to fall into an unstable equilibrium where no one is running a fraud checker because it is non-zero cost and 99.9...% of the time it isn't necessary.  Once you are in a situation where no one is running a fraud checker, the system can defraud users and not get caught.

author: sky.cactus
content: Incentivize fraud checkers is quite difficult.
